name: makeComputePipelineState(function:options:completionHandler:)
desc: Asynchronously creates a new compute pipeline state object, and associated reflection information, using a function object.Required.

items.name: struct MTLPipelineOption
items.desc: Options that determine how Metal prepares the pipeline.

items.name: typealias MTLNewComputePipelineStateWithReflectionCompletionHandler
items.desc: A block of code that is invoked when the logic to create a MTLComputePipelineState object is completed.
